page.description: Allows the administrator to add a new Group to the user/groups file.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5_add_new_group(C master_password ,C group_name )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = the group was successfully added. .F. = the group was not added.

argument.name: master_password
argument.description: The master password for the database.

argument.name: group_name
argument.description: The name of the new group.

page.discussion: The A5_ADD_NEW_GROUP() function allows the administrator to add a new group. Requires that the database first be password protected.
